quest.name: True Carrot Crimes
journal:
 Quest Sync
Watchingway has a mystery in want of solving.

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir─have you by chance seen any thieves prowling about with ill-gotten iron carrots? They're crimson, tender, surprisingly heavy...the carrots, that is, not the thieves.

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you haven't seen them yet, I'm sure you will! We've been told that you “adventurers” are quite good at solving crimes that no one else can be bothered with.

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I'm relying on you to solve our carrot caper. Honestly, what manner of fiend would deny a Loporrit their dinner...

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ahem. Anyway, our culprit─or culprits─took four carrots in all. Those are not easy to carry about, so I daresay they can't have gotten far!

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: There must be a clue around here somewhere...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This scrumptious-looking iron carrot has been tragically abandoned in its prime.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04240
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Insufficient stock of iron carrots... Iron carrot detected. Initiating iron carrot procurement!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Based on the primer you but recently received, you can say with relative certainty that iron carrots are not blue...

dialogue.name: LOPORRITS04240
dialogue.text: <munch> <munch>...<gulp> Mmm! These philosopher's carrots really hit the spot! Just a few more... Wha─!?

dialogue.name: LOPORRITS04240
dialogue.text: What? No, of course I'm not stealing! These are mine. Is it so wrong to enjoy an early dinner?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The muttering Loporrit stomps off in search of a place to eat in peace. You suspect this is not your carrot culprit.

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: You're back! Please tell me you found the carrots.

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: The supporter? I never would have suspected... It's supposed to help us farm carrots, not eat them!

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hmm... I recall the technicians said something about enhancing its code with a love for carrots to increase work efficiency. But to go so far as to steal carrots for itself, I fear it may now love them a little too much...

dialogue.name: WATCHINGWAY
dialogue.text: Alas, those poor carrots! But at least we know what became of them, and how to prevent this happening again. Thank you for your assistance!
